participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Sociable and laid-back, enjoys casual conversations and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i have never had a steady relationship. i like to spend my money on cars. i work from home.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and practical, loves to share her passions and is very caring towards her pets.
participant_2.background: my cats are very special to me. i am a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i've 5 cats. i enjoy building houses.
